content: Hi. I installed your app to support your work. Unfortuatelly some modules like Edge Touch, Edge Lighting, Nice Catch, Tag Board and One Hand Op are shown as separate icons on the App list. I have too many icons on the screen. Why?
replyContent:
Some modules are set the show their shortcuts in launchers, some (region restricted ones) are hidden, some show for specific functions(Tagboard). This is decided by Samsung. I will work on "hiding" option inside NiceLock, you may use your launcher's hide apps function as workaround meanwhile. Please email me if you would like a refund.  
Regards

content: why do I have to sign away my privacy in the start screen if I paid for the ad free version??
replyContent: Privacy policy is mandatory by Google's requirements since NiceLock access app inventory (to check if a module is installed) and ad-ID for crash logs. It is mostly a generic policy, but It is needed to comply with Play Store rules. No data is stored by me. Please feel free to contact me at bluehorizonapps@gmail.com for extra information or a refund
